contest-event.event-date:
April 20, 1935 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points)
Waverley Market, Edinburgh Edinburgh Band Association - in aid of the Royal Infirmary
Hymn contest: 1. Tullis, 2. Bonnybridge, 3. St Augustine's
Deportment: 1. Wellesley, 2. Falkirk, 3. Lochore.
Best section 2 band - Knightswood. Best section 3 band - St Augustine's. Best section 4 bands - Airdrie Old Union. 20 bands competed.
Aug. 7, 2013, 9:14 a.m. Oct. 25, 2013, 7:49 a.m.
